921680.name: Into Oblivion - Private Reserve
921680.description:
The Into Oblivion - Private Reserve DLC contains such goodies as new skins for the game, the soundtrack, wallpapers, printable card game for home play, and more. As we release content updates for the game, we will pack more things in too.


DLC Skins

Get 15 new DLC skins, 3 per category, for the main game; unlocked and ready to use. Look extra special for your match.

Last Drop Update

For our last major patch, we added five new skins too!

Into Oblivion: The Card Game

A printable PDF of all the games cards so you can play at home. The PDF also has a list of all needed materials (like dice and a pen), the official rules, and a score sheet to keep track of your points. It can be played with or without legal beverages for your country and age.

Into Oblivion: Soundtrack

The full game soundtrack with music from Macabre Gandhi and David Totten. It includes the following tracks:
  • 1 - Mould Menu (Judas is Carrion Redux 2)
  • 2 - Alcoholic Affair (ForAbsolutelyNoReasonAtAll)
  • 3 - Beer Brawl (Go Ahead)
  • 4 - Cognac Crisis (NowThatsThatBullshssh)
  • 5 - Drambuie Deathmatch (Visceral00)
  • 6 - Ethanol Event (Profound Footage)
  • 7 - Firewater Fight (Depends On The Situation)

Wallpapers, Posters, And Thanks

Last but not least, thirteen wallpapers with characters from the game and their arenas. There is also a printable 14" x 11" poster of the game's art and a special thank you note from CoaguCo Industries.
